turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I'm available any day next week, preferably in the afternoon.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help you with that. Let me check Dr. Ramirez's availability for next week. Please wait a moment... Alright, the only available slots next week that fit your criteria are Tuesday at 2:30 PM and Thursday at 3:15 PM. Which one works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Tuesday at 2:30 PM is perfect! Could you please confirm the appointment and send me a reminder?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Your appointment with Dr. Ramirez is confirmed for Tuesday at 2:30 PM. A reminder will be sent to your registered email address 24 hours before the appointment. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, actually. I need to reschedule my flu shot. I was supposed to get it last month, but I've been so busy. Can I schedule it at the same time as my check-up?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, I don't have the ability to check on your previous appointments, nor can I schedule a flu shot at the same time as the check-up. I can schedule a separate appointment for the flu shot, but it would have to be on a different day. Would you like me to do that now?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, this is frustrating. Yes, please schedule a separate appointment for the flu shot. Any day the following week, in the morning would be great.
